about_the_game:
CYBERPHOBIA

In the near future, A.I. droids are attacking the city.

Grab Your weapons and Go get 'em!

This is a challenging Looter Shooter game.

The game includes a Multiplayer & Single Player system.

You can Invite Your Steam Friends with the ' + ' Key from the main menu.

It features all the necessary content needed to provide the Player with the best user and gameplay experience, such as a unique CYBER 3D environment, GUI design, and complete gameplay mechanics.

The Game is packed with inventory management, missions, looting system, swimming system, level-ups, and AI, combat mechanics, and many more features provided down in the list below, tested online with clients under load. Compatible with Steam online subsystem.

* NOTE : You should have a Stable & Fast Internet Connection for Best Results *

Features:

Advanced Inventory

Inventory Quickslots

Item Durability

Advanced Mission/Quest System with invitations

Host PC based Saving System

Complex Holstering System

Advanced Skill and Level Up system

Survival Stats (Health, Hunger, and Thirst)

Percentual Reward Division (Based on Damage)

Player Lobby and Menu system

Dynamic Crosshair System

Unique CYBER environment

Range and Melee weapons with damage, ammunition handling, and FX.

Throwable Grenades

AI and Enemy camp system

Advanced Damage System

Advanced Player knockout and death system (Revive Included)

Full SFX + Music

Interaction system

Advanced Dialogue System merged with Mission System

DROID NPCs

Fully interactable Water system with Swimming and Diving

Sniper Rifle scoping (zooming) mechanics

HoverCars to Drive

and much more…
